items.title: promote
items.description: promotes a user in the group - admin

items.title: demote
items.description: demotes a user in the group - admin

items.title: add
items.description: adds a user to the group - admin

items.title: ban
items.description: removes a user from the group - admin

items.title: ld
items.description: enables/disables link detector in the group - admin

items.title: og
items.description: enables/disables mentions only in the group - admin

items.title: md
items.description: enables/disables malicious content detector in the group - admin

items.title: td
items.description: enables/disables WhatsApp-crashing message detector in the group - admin

items.title: bv
items.description: enables/disables the welcome message when someone joins the group - admin

items.title: asticker
items.description: enables/disables automatic sticker creation in the group - admin

items.title: ainvite
items.description: enables/disables automatic invitation in the group - admin

items.title: dload
items.description: downloads content from various social media platforms

items.title: totext
items.description: converts an audio message into text
